meanings.definition: The quality or state of being horrid.
meanings.sent1: The horridnesses of the haunted house scared me.
meanings.sent2: The movie was filled with horridnesses that made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent3: The horridnesses of the situation were so exaggerated, it almost seemed funny.
meanings.sent4: The horridnesses of the storm were like a dark cloud hanging over us.
meanings.sent5: The horridnesses of the nightmare haunted me for days.

meanings.definition: Instances of being extremely unpleasant or disagreeable.
meanings.sent1: I couldn't stand the horridnesses of the spoiled food in the fridge.
meanings.sent2: The horridnesses of the argument lingered in the air long after they left.
meanings.sent3: The horridnesses of the taste made me scrunch up my face in disgust.
meanings.sent4: The horridnesses of the news hit me like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The horridnesses of the smell were so overpowering, I had to leave the room.
